mapper.insert: insert into loan_product_type (creator_id, create_time, editor_id, edit_time, status, flag, type_id, product_id) values (#{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{editorId}, #{editTime}, #{status}, #{flag}, #{typeId}, #{productId})
mapper.update: update loan_product_type set editor_id = #{editorId}, edit_time = #{editTime}, type_id = #{typeId}, product_id = #{productId} where id = #{id}
update loan_product_type set status = false, flag = false where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from loan_product_type where status = true and flag = true and id = #{id}
